meanings.definition: The act of revoking, canceling, or withdrawing something previously decided or agreed upon.
meanings.sent1: The rescindment of the permission to go outside upset the children.
meanings.sent2: The rescindment of the contract caused a lot of confusion among the employees.
meanings.sent3: The rescindment of the dessert after dinner left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent4: Her rescindment of the invitation felt like a slap in the face.
meanings.sent5: The rescindment of the curfew made the teenagers very happy.

meanings.definition: The process of officially annulling or invalidating a contract, law, or decision.
meanings.sent1: The rescindment of the law led to protests in the city.
meanings.sent2: The rescindment of the contract required a lot of paperwork.
meanings.sent3: The rescindment of the rule about wearing hats indoors was met with relief.
meanings.sent4: The rescindment of the decision came as a shock to everyone involved.
meanings.sent5: The rescindment of the agreement left both parties feeling uncertain.
